title: Interior court-yards, covered parking spaces and garages: These shall be raised at least 15cmabove the surrounding ground level and shall be satisfactorily drained
clause_text: Interior court-yards, covered parking spaces and garages: These shall be raised at least 15cmabove the surrounding ground level and shall be satisfactorily drained. Size and Width: The minimum size and width shall be as given in the Table No 14 hereunder.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Interior court-yards, covered parking spaces and garages: These shall be raised at least 15cmabove the surrounding ground level and shall be satisfactorily drained.
